snippet: When a Sausalito councilman slapped the hand of a councilwoman during a meeting, many saw it as a symbol of how divided the City Council had become.
lead_paragraph: When a Sausalito councilman slapped the hand of a councilwoman during a meeting, many saw it as a symbol of how divided the City Council had become.

headline.main: A Hand Slap Resounds in Sausalito
headline.print_headline: A Hand Slap Resounds In Sausalito
